name: Route 13 (itch)
description:
This is a game of obscure horrors, if you have triskaidekaphobia (the fear of the number 13), kinemortophobia  (the fear of zombies) or anatidaephobia (the fear of Ducks) then this is not the game for you. You must escape route 13 without losing your life to the rotting zombies or the rabid ducks in this 2D nightmare made by @Charliewright and I.

We were tasked to create a game on obscure horrors in only three days, a big challenge, and here you can see the end result.

Unfortunately, due to issues with WebGL in Unity 2020, I am unable to have this be played in the browser. I hope this won't deter you from playing. After downloading the file, unzip it/extract all and then open the file and open the exe file. Sorry for the inconvenience, hope you enjoy it.
